title: Understanding Dataset Overlap
text: Consider the types of datasets that are frequently used in various applications. Think about whether these datasets might also contain sensitive information that could pose privacy risks.

title: Privacy Risk in Common Datasets
text: Reflect on the nature of datasets that are commonly used. Do they often include personal or sensitive information that could lead to privacy concerns?

title: Analyzing Dataset Usage and Privacy
text: Identify examples of datasets that are frequently used. Do these examples include any personal data that could be considered high-risk for privacy?

title: Overlap Between Usage and Risk
text: Think about the relationship between the frequency of dataset usage and the level of privacy risk they carry. Is it possible for a dataset to be both commonly used and high-risk?
